Course Section: VISA_V 110-227 - Foundation Studio: Digital Media
Course Section Definition Public Notes: In VISA 110-227, there are 24 seats reserved for students in the Bachelor of Media Studies (BMS) program, 39 seats for students in the Coordinated Arts Program (CAP), and 17 general seats for students in all other programs. You must also register in one of the secondary sections (labs) L21, L22, L23, or L24.

Course Section: VISA_V 180-002 - Foundation Studio: Approaches to Media
Course Section Definition Public Notes: VISA 180 002 lecture is delivered online. The studio (tutorial) sections are delivered in person. You must sign up for both the lecture and one of the studio sections. There is no waitlist for VISA 180. Please check regularly for seats, particularly at the start of term as students are rearranging their schedules.

Course Section: WRDS_V 150-A_301 - Writing and Research in the Disciplines (A)
Course Section Definition Public Notes:
WRDS 150A is ONLY for students in the Faculty of Arts. 
 Visit https://jwam.ubc.ca/undergraduate/writing-studies-programs/arts-students/wrds-150a-topics-term-2/  for WRDS 150A course topics.

If this section is closed (full) please fill out the form here: https://jwam.ubc.ca/wrds-150a-waitlist-winter-terms-1-2/ to add yourself to a wait list.

Students in other Faculties: Use the 'Search' field for WRDS 150-B.
